title: Integrated Social Studies Learning Design Through Video Material Development and Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary educational theory knowledge and digital tool usage experience
context.additional_context: Workshop for 30s professional elementary teachers: social studies video material development and integrated lesson design.

learning_goals: Learners can produce overview videos visualizing social studies concept structures using tablet technology.
Learners can develop lesson plans integrating video materials by combining concept maps and learning design maps.
Learners can develop social studies teaching-learning materials utilizing video suitable for project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
